text: Sore de kare-ra wa,(mata) kare (yūsufu) no moto ni yattekite itta. `Mōshiagemasu. Sainan (kikin) ga watashi-tachi to ichizoku no mono ni furikakattanode, hon'no somatsuna shina o motte san irimashita. Masume o jūbun ni shite, watashi-tachi ni hodokoshite kudasai. Hontōni arrā wa hodokoshi o ataeru mono o mukuwa remasu
